text: Welcome {name} to {company_name} Education Services. You have successfully enrolled in text message notifications.

email.subject: New course registration
email.body:
Hey {name},

You have been registered for {course_name} starting on {first_class_dtm} taught by {instructors}. If you have any questions, please call {course_number} or email {course_email}.

Remote Link: {remote_link}.

Address: {address}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
